description: Proficient in creating structured, semantic, and responsive web pages using HTML and CSS
Strong understanding of JavaScript for client-side scripting and interaction with the DOM. Knowledge of modern frameworks/libraries
Knowledge of database systems like MongoDB and the ability to design, implement, and interact with databases
Competent in creating server-side logic, handling requests, and managing application logic
Strong understanding on how to design, build, and consume APIs. RESTful which are common in modern web development
Proficient use of version control systems, such as Git, for tracking changes in code and collaborating with other developers
Knowledge of web servers for hosting web applications
Competent in working with the command line interface for tasks such as:
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug and troubleshoot issues efficiently
